name: Not Your Mother's Pumpkin Bread
author: Noel P
summary: This adult version of an old classic is not as sweet as its predecessors.  It has subtle and tantalizing spicing. Delish!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease three 8x4 inch loaf pans
In a large bowl, beat together white sugar, brown sugar and oil
Mix in the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition
In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, coriander and salt
Stir dry ingredients into pumpkin mixture until smooth
Beat till thoroughly blended, 1 to 2 minutes
Spoon batter into 3 greased 8x4 inch loaf pans, filling no more than three quarters full
Bake in preheated oven until a tester inserted into center of a loaf comes out clean, about 65 minutes
Let stand 5 minutes in pans before turn out onto wire racks to cool completely
Can be kept at room temp
